meanings.definition: A piece of cloth worn around the hips and covering the genitals, typically worn by indigenous peoples in tropical climates.
meanings.sent1: The loincloth was made of soft fabric and tied securely around his waist.
meanings.sent2: In the jungle, the tribesmen wore a loincloth to stay cool in the heat.
meanings.sent3: When the monkey stole his loincloth, he had to chase it through the trees.
meanings.sent4: The loincloth was his only shield against the scorching sun.
meanings.sent5: The bright red loincloth stood out against the lush green foliage.

meanings.definition: To wear a loincloth as a form of traditional dress.
meanings.sent1: He would loincloth himself before joining the ceremonial dance.
meanings.sent2: The warrior decided to loincloth for the sacred ritual.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly suggested they all loincloth for the costume party.
meanings.sent4: The actor had to loincloth for his role in the historical movie.
meanings.sent5: The tradition required him to loincloth before entering the sacred grounds.
